page.description: Receive a file from the server. Contents are received as binary unless ReceiveBinary is set to .f.
page.prototype: .ReceiveFile as L (SourceFile as C, TargetFile as C [, SendBinary as L])

argument.name: ReceiveBinary
argument.description: Default = *[xb:.t.]*. Contents of file are received as binary. Set to *[xb:.f.]* to receive the file contents as text data.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.t.]* if the operation succeed. Otherwise, returns *[xb:.f.]*. If an error occurred, the *[xb:INET::FTP CallResult]* property will contain more information.

page.example:
dim ftp as INET::FTP ftp.UserName = "Fred" ftp.Password = "Secret" ftp.EnableSSL = .t. ftp.Host = "ftp.myserver.com" ftp.UsePassive = .t.
if ftp.ReceiveFile("myData.csv","target.csv") <> .t. ' error msg = ftp.callResult.error ... end if
